Instance.description: Global tuning parameters for video playback on the client.

Tunable.name: PauseDistance
Tunable.description: Distance in meters from the camera at which video objects temporarily pause. If zero, pausing by distance is disabled.

Tunable.name: VirtualizationDistance
Tunable.description: Distance in meters from the camera at which video objects enter virtualization mode and stop playing video entirely. If zero, virtualization by distance is disabled.
